result.title: Invitation to Code Gladiators 2018 (Programming)
result.content:
Hi Everyone,

I would like to invite you all to participate in the TechGig Annual Programming Contest (Code Gladiators 2018). It is an individual contest.

The contest will have 3 rounds::

  1. Qualifier: It will be an online contest. The contest have 2 problems. You need to score 100 marks to qualify for the next round.
  2. Semifinal: It will be an online contest having 2 problems. Top 300 participants will qualify for finale.
  3. Finals: It will be an offline contest of 6 hours having 2 problems.

Schedule:

  • Qualifier: 20 Mar — 2 May 2018
  • Semifinal: 5 May — 21 May 2018
  • Finals: 8 June 2018

Click here to Register
